// Pivot 0, 0
int LeftLever[16] = {
	76, 48,
	83, 47,
	87, 41,
	85, 33,
	16, 2,
	6, 2,
	0, 11,
	2, 23
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float LeftLever[16] = {
	0.844444f, 0.960000f,
	0.922222f, 0.940000f,
	0.966667f, 0.820000f,
	0.944444f, 0.660000f,
